snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated Andy Murray in the Sony Ericsson final, showing why he remains the man to beat when the Grand Slam season resumes in two months at the French Open.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Andy Murray to win Sony Ericsson Open tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated Andy Murray in the Sony Ericsson final, showing why he remains the man to beat when the Grand Slam season resumes in two months at the French Open.

headline.seo: Sony Ericsson Open — Djokovic Wins Final, Steadying Slam Path
headline.main: With Title, Djokovic Steadies His Slam Path
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Tops Murray For Title at Key Biscayne
